description: Modern T-shirt with a sporty design. The Tech T-Shirt is your companion in the climbing gym or in the city. The front and sleeves are made from comfortable, recycled Lyocell fibers. These are industrially produced synthetic fibers. The back and shoulders are made from an elasticated and antimicrobial material. The mixture of materials is ideal for your workouts, offering pleasant comfort combined with freedom of movement and a fresh feeling.
name: Mammut Tech T-Shirt - Mens
